home.title: What would you like to do today?
home.description: You want to break free from the monotonous daily routine, but you don't know what you want to do? No problem, here you'll find all sorts of events in your area!
home.ai_search_placeholder: AI search: What would you like to do?
home.about_us_text: Eventify is a unique program for creating and discovering all kinds of events that can diversify our daily lives - from parties to scientific events and conferences.
home.services_descr: Discover the perfect event for you. Organize events that will be discovered by the right audience.
home.discover_events_descr: Find the perfect event for you in your area with just a few clicks and the help of Eventify AI.
home.create_events_descr: Host and organize your own events.
home.connect_with_others_descr: Connect with people who share your interests.
home.real_time_updates_descr: Stay informed about the latest updates and announcements for your events.
home.easy_management_descr: Easily manage your events and track audience.
home.support_safety_descr: All events are constantly updated and verified by our team.
home.organizer_creates_event_descr: Event organizers can easily and intuitively create their events, providing all necessary details to attract users.
home.user_finds_event: The User Finds the Event and Pays for It
home.user_finds_event_descr: Users browse events specially suggested for them, choose the ones that interest them, and make secure payments to confirm their participation.
home.organizer_gets_paid: The Organizer Gets Paid for the Event
home.organizer_gets_paid_descr: After the event is successfully held, organizers receive their payments through bank transfer.
home.work_process_description: Understand the steps from event creation to participation
home.review_1: The events are always of high quality, and the community is fantastic. I have never been disappointed!
home.review_2: A great way to diversify your daily routine. There are always events on offer that are perfect for me!
home.review_3: A wide variety of events, intuitive UX, everything is just a click away, highly recommended!
home.rates_description: Start creating events without the need for a large budget. Participate in all events.
home.hobby_description: Perfect for event participators and hobby event creators.
home.hobby_feature2: Create up to 5 events per month
home.hobby_feature5: Basic and Premium event features disabled
home.basic_description: Perfect for event organizers with up to 20 events/month.
home.basic_feature2: Create up to 20 events per month
home.basic_feature4: Event advertising as add-on with 20% discount
home.premium_description: Perfect for event organizers with lots of events.
home.premium_feature4: All event advertising features are enabled
home.contact_description: Connect with us through various channels, available 24/7.
